ca:posa el pin digital _ a _ es:fijar pin digital _ en _ cs:nastav digit√°ln√≠ pin _ na _ de:Setze digitalen Pin _ auf _ et:m√§√§ra digitaalviigule _ v√§√§rtus _ eu:ezarri _ pin digitalean _ balioa fr:mettre la pin num√©rique _ √† _ gl:fixar pin dixital _ en _ he:_ -◊ú _ ◊ì◊ô◊í◊ô◊ò◊ú◊ô◊ô◊™ ◊®◊í◊ú ◊©◊†◊î id:set pin digital _ menjadi _ it:imposta il pin digitale _ a _ ko:ÎîîÏßÄÌÑ∏ ÌïÄ _ ÏùÑ _ Î°ú ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÍ∏∞ nl:zet digitale pin _ op _ pl:ustaw cyfrowy pin _ na _ pt:coloca no pino digital _ o valor booleano _ pt_BR:coloque no pino digital _ o valor booleano _ ru:–∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑—ä–µ–º–∞ _ –Ω–∞ _ sv:s√§tt digital pin _ till _ tr:Sayƒ±sal pin D _ deƒüerini _ yap ua:–≤—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç–∏ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∏–π –ø—ñ–Ω _ —è–∫ _ zh_CN:Êï∞Â≠óËÑö _ ËÆæÁΩÆÊàê _ zh_TW:Êï∏‰ΩçËÖ≥ _ Ë®≠ÂÆöÊàê _

ca:posa el pin _ al valor _ es:fijar pin _ al valor _ cs:nastav PWM pin _ na _ de:Setze Pin _ auf _ et:m√§√§ra viigule _ v√§√§rtus _ eu:ezarri _ pinean _ balioa fr:mettre la pin _ √† _ gl:fixar pin _ ao valor _ he:_ -◊ú _ ◊ë◊®◊í◊ú PWM ◊ß◊ë◊¢ id:set pin _ menjadi bernilai _ it:imposta il pin _ a _ ko:PWM ÌïÄ _ ÏùÑ _ ÏúºÎ°ú ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÍ∏∞ nl:zet pin _ op _ pl:ustaw PWM pin _ na _ pt:coloca no pino (PWM) _ o valor _ pt_BR:coloque no pino _ o valor _ ru:–∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å —Ä–∞–∑—ä–µ–º–∞ PWM _ –Ω–∞ _ sv:s√§tt pin _ till v√§rde _ tr:Sayƒ±sal pin D _ deƒüerini _ yap ua:–≤—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç–∏ –ø—ñ–Ω PWM _ —è–∫ _ zh_CN:_ ËÑöÁöÑÂÄºËÆæÁΩÆÊàê _ zh_TW:_ ËÖ≥ÁöÑÂÄºË®≠ÂÆöÊàê _

ca:posa el servo _ a _ es:fijar servo _ en _ cs:nastav servo _ na _ de:Setze Servo _ auf _ et:m√§√§ra servoviigule _ v√§√§rtus _ eu:ezarri _ serbomotorra _ bezala fr:mettre le servo _ √† _ gl:fixar servo _ en _ he:_ -◊ú _ ◊ë◊®◊í◊ú ◊û◊†◊ï◊¢ ◊î◊ë◊ê id:set servo _ menjadi _ it:imposta servo _ a _ ko:ÏÑúÎ≥¥ ÌïÄ _ ÏùÑ _ Î°ú ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÍ∏∞ nl:zet servo _ op _ pl:ustaw serwo _ na _ pt:coloca o servo _ _ pt_BR:posicione o servo _ em _ ru:–∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å —Ä–∞–∑—ä–µ–º–∞ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–æ _ –Ωa _ sv:s√§tt servo _ till _ tr:Servo pin D _ deƒüerini _ yap ua:–≤—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç–∏ –ø—ñ–Ω —Å–µ—Ä–≤–æ _ —è–∫ _ zh_CN:_ ËÑöÁöÑËàµÊú∫ËÆæÁΩÆÊàê _ zh_TW:_ ËÖ≥ÁöÑ‰º∫ÊúçÈ¶¨ÈÅîË®≠ÂÆöÊàê _

ca:lectura anal√≤gica _ es:lectura anal√≥gica _ cs:analogov√Ω vstup _ de:lies analogen Pin _ et:analooglugem viigult _ eu:irakurketa analogikoa _ pinean fr:lecture analogique _ gl:lectura anal√≥xica _ he:_ ◊û ◊ê◊†◊ú◊ï◊í◊ô◊™ ◊ß◊®◊ô◊ê◊î id:pembacaan analog _ it:lettura analogica _ ko:ÏïÑÎÇ†Î°úÍ∑∏ ÏûÖÎ†• _ Î≤à ÌïÄ nl:lees analoge pin _ uit pl:odczyt analogowy _ pt:o valor anal√≥gico no pino _ pt_BR:o valor anal√≥gico no pino _ ru:–∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ _ sv:analog avl√§sning _ tr:Analog pin oku A _ ua:–∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è _ zh_CN:Ê®°ÊãüËæìÂÖ•ÂÄº _ zh_TW:È°ûÊØîËº∏ÂÖ•ÂÄº _

ca:lectura digital _ es:lectura digital _ cs:digit√°ln√≠ vstup _ de:lies digitalen Pin _ et:digitaallugem viigult _ eu:irakurketa digitala _ pinean fr:lecture num√©rique _ gl:lectura dixital _ he:_ ◊û ◊°◊§◊®◊™◊ô◊™ ◊ß◊®◊ô◊ê◊î id:pembacaan digital _ it:lettura digitale _ ko:ÎîîÏßÄÌÑ∏ ÏûÖÎ†• _ Î≤à ÌïÄ nl:lees digitale pin _ uit pl:odczyt cyfrowy _ pt:o valor booleano no pino digital _ √© ¬´verdadeiro¬ª pt_BR:o valor booleano no pino digital _ √© ¬´verdadeiro¬ª ru:—Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ _ sv:digital avl√§sning _ tr:Sayƒ±sal pin oku D _ ua:—Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è _ zh_CN:Êï∞Â≠óËæìÂÖ•ÂÄº _ zh_TW:Êï∏‰ΩçËº∏ÂÖ•ÂÄº _

block-definition.s: i2c write data %'lst' to register %'reg' at address %'address'
block-definition.translations: ca:i2c escriu dades _ al registre _ de l'adre√ßa _ es:i2c escribir datos _ al registro _ de la direcci√≥n _
ca:i2c envia comandes _ a l'adre√ßa _ es:i2c enviar comandos _ a la direcci√≥n _
ca:i2c llegeix _ registres de l'adre√ßa _ es:i2c leer _ registros en la direcci√≥n _

block-definition.comment: Play sound of selected frequenzy (Hz) during a time (miliseconds value) using a buzzer on the selected pin. -Frequency. Accept values from 0 to 65535 Hz, but real operation range is 32-16000Hz. -Duration. Accept values up to 60000ms. -Default pin is 14 (A0), ready to Imagina shield.
block-definition.translations: ca:$robot Brunzidor al pin _ | _ Hz _ ms es:$robot Tono al pin _ | _ Hz _ ms

block-definition.comment: Sends a pulse (high or low) to the selected pin. - Times (in microseconds) for the pulse: initialStateTime, pulseTime, endingStateTime - Times are 11 bits values: (0-2047 microseconds)
block-definition.translations: ca:$robot envia pols al pin _ | _ _ _ _ es:$robot enviar pulso al pin _ | _ _ _ _

block-definition.comment: Return a pulse (either HIGH or LOW) on a pin in microseconds. Default timeout is 1 second (1000000 ¬µs)
block-definition.translations: ca:$robot llegeix pols (¬µs) al pin _ | _ temps l√≠mit: _ ¬µs es:$robot leer pulso (¬µs) en el pin _ | _ tiempo l√≠mite: _ ¬µ√ü

block-definition.comment: Return distance (in cm) from a Ultrasonic sensor. -Tested range from 3 up to 400 cm. Timeouts return 1000. -You must select the connection pins (trigger and echo). -You can modify trigger pulse. By default it sends a 5 ¬µs pulse after 2¬µs in low state. -Distance calculation assumes the speed of sound is 343m/s (value in dry air at 20¬∫C)
block-definition.translations: ca:$robot ping (cm) Trig _ Echo _ pols _ _ ¬µs es:$robot ping (cm) Trig _ Echo _ pulso _ _ ¬µs

block-definition.comment: Return sensor values from a Nunchuk connected to I2C pins. -Sensors: Joystick (joyX and joyY), buttons ( butC and butZ) and accelerometers (accX, accY and accZ) -Nunchuk I2C connection uses SCL, SDA, Ground and Vcc

inputs.input: joyX joyX joyY butZ butC accX accY accZ

block-definition.comment: Return humidity/temperature (¬∫C) from DHT11 sensor connected on selected pin.
block-definition.translations: ca:$robot DHT11 _ al pin _ es:$robot DHT11 _ en el pin _
ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 posa el LED _ a _ es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 fija el LED _ a _

block-definition.comment: Send IR signal (hexadecimal code) by IR emitter diode on pin 3, using Sony or RC5 protocol. You can send values from 0 to FFFFFF (6 hexadecimal digits).
block-definition.translations: ca:$robot-1.25-230-168-34 IR envia _ amb _ es:$robot-1.25-230-168-34 IR env√≠a _ con _

block-definition.comment: You can Enable/Disable IR receiver function. -Default state is disabled. -Enabling action allows IR rec function and disables PWM function on pins 3 and 11. -Disabling action turns on PWM function again on pins 3 and 11.

Return IR code (hexadecimal) from IR receiver connected to pin 11. -You must "Enable IR rec" before. This action disables PWM function on pins 3 and 11. -After using this receiver you can "Disable IR rec" to turn on PWM function on pins 3 and 11 again.

block-definition.translations: ca:inicia el m√≤dul Connector S4A es:iniciar el m√≥dulo Conector S4A

block-definition.comment: Play sound of selected frequenzy (Hz) during a time (miliseconds value) using a buzzer on the selected pin. -Frequency. Accept values from 0 to 65535 Hz, but real operation range is 32-16000Hz. -Duration. Accept values up to 60000ms. -Default pin is 14 (A0), ready to Imagina shield.
block-definition.translations: ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 to _ Hz durant _ ms es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 tono _ Hz durante _ ms
ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 beep durant _ ms es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 beep durante _ ms
ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 temperatura (¬∫C) es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 temperatura (¬∫C)

inputs.input: A0 A0 A1 A2 A3 A4 A5 D2 D3

block.l: A0 A1 A2 A3 A4 A5 D2 D3

block-definition.translations: ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 posa el servo _ a _ es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 fijar servo _ a _
ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 posa el pin digital _ a _ es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 fijar pin digital _ a _
ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 lectura anal√≤gica _ es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 lectura anal√≥gica _
ca:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 lectura digital _ es:$üÖ¥-1.5-230-106-0 lectura digital _
ca:$robot-1.25-243-118-29 configura _ LEDs Neopixel al pin _ es:$robot-1.25-243-118-29 configurar _ LEDs Neopixel en el pin _

block-definition.s: $robot-1.25-243-118-29 set LED %'LED number' to R: %'r' G: %'g' B: %'b'
block-definition.translations: ca:$robot-1.25-243-118-29 posa el LED _ a R: _ G: _ B: _ es:$robot-1.25-243-118-29 fijar el LED _ a R: _ G: _ B: _

scripts.comment: S4A Connector with Echidna Black blocks. Connect your Echidna black shield v2 to Snap! SA5Firmata firmware is required. Load directly to your Echidna at https://snap.creativelearninglab.click/course/view.php?id=2
